TextView.android:text: The Department has well experienced faculty members and well established laboratories. The major laboratories of the Dept are Electrical Machines Lab, Power System lab, Power Electronic Lab, Control System Lab and Electrical Measurements and Instrumentation Lab. The computational lab has Matlab software with all tool boxes and PSCAD software and is going to procure NEPLAW/Mi Power software for conducting studies on inter connected Power System.
Probability And Statistics And Optimization Techniques
Computer Application in Mechanical Engineering Lab
English Language And Communication Skills Lab
